name: beta-tensorflow
preInstallNotes:
This DC/OS Service is currently a beta candidate undergoing testing as part of a formal beta test program.

There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies.
postInstallNotes:
The DC/OS TensorFlow service is being installed!

	Documentation: https://github.com/dcos/examples/tree/master/tensorflow/
	Issues: https://chat.dcos.io
postUninstallNotes:
The DC/OS TensorFlow service is being uninstalled.

For DC/OS versions from 1.10 no further action is required. For older DC/OS versions follow the instructions at https://github.com/dcos/examples/tree/master/tensorflow/uninstall to remove any persistent state if required.
